::Spears::

She jumps as the pod jerks arround and hearing the computer report 
it's statis. "CALM DOWN! WE"RE GONG TO BE HIGH UP IN THE AIR FOR 
TRIPPLE THE TIME AND YOU TELL ME TO CALM DOWN?!"

She realized she was yelling. "I'm sorry, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to 
yell. Everything is going to be fine. You just drive the pod. I'm 
just going to sit right here and not move."  she was almost 
hyperventalting.  She closed her eyes and covered her face with her 
hands.
Great, now he knows and I'm never going to hear the end of it, she 
thought.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker looks over at Spears, noting that she was almost 
panicing. "Calm 
> down, we-"
> 
> "Warning. Power level low."
> 
> Striker jerks his head toward the console as the computer reports 
this, 
> walking toward it and pressing a few buttons. The pod shakes as the 
engines 
> power down slightly, only regaining enough to keep going at a slow 
movement.
> 
> "We're not almost there. The trip just trippled," Striker says as 
the solar 
> panels begin to gather energy, the Maximal sitting down.
